description:
Joins us for our special Valentine's Day creations all weekend long all they way through Valentine's Day. 

We'll be featuring some great Food & Beverage Specials. To make your reservations visit SavasRestaurant.com/reservations or call us at 734-623-2233

DRINK SPECIALS
__________________

A FRENCH ROSE
creme yvette, cocchi americano rosa, parigot rosé

QUEEN OF HEARTS
hendrick's gin, st. germain, lavender syrup, lemon juice, cranberry juice, apple-cranberry cider

KING OF HEARTS
johnnie walker red, averna, carpano antica, chocolate bitters

DINNER SPECIALS
__________________

FILET & PRAWNS
choice grade 6 oz. filet with 2 jumbo prawns and beurre maître d’hotel. With pommes fondant and veal glazed carrots

MOULES  CHAMPAGNE 
bay harbor mussels steamed in an herbed champagne cream broth, served with baguette

OYSTERS
oysters, black pepper-balsamic sorbet, minced shallot, micro radish, cucumber brunoise

HALF-ROAST CHICKEN
brined half-chicken, roasted fingerling potatoes, warm spinach salad with apple, sarvecchio and creamy bacon vinaigrette

RISOTTO STUFFED SQUASH
butternut squash risotto, wild mushroom blend, braised leeks, roast acorn squash, curried romesco, roasted asparagus
name: Sava's Valentine's Day Featured Food & Beverage Specials

description:
CMSa2 welcomes instrumentalists of all ages to come join our Classical and Jazz ensembles during a week of open house rehearsals! Experience the joy of playing in an orchestra, jazz combo or chamber ensemble, meet our conductors and teachers, learn more about our programs, make new friends and play music from Beethoven to Chick Corea to John Williams!

The schedule for the rehearsals is listed below:

MONDAY:
Concert Orchestra - 5:30PM-7:15PM @ Scarlett Middle School
Symphony Orchestra - 6:30PM-8:30PM @ Scarlett Middle School
Wind Ensemble - 6:30PM-8:30PM @ CMSa2
Brass Ensemble - 6:30PM-8:30PM @ CMSa2

TUESDAY
Youth Jazz Combo - 6:00PM-7:30PM @ CMSa2
Adult Jazz Combo - 8:00PM-9:30PM @ CMSa2

WEDNESDAY
New Horizons Senior String Orchestra - 1:00PM-3:00PM @ CMSa2
Adult Jazz Combo - 8:00PM-9:30PM @ CMSa2

THURSDAY
Percussion Ensemble - 6:30PM-8:30PM @ Clague Middle School

We look forward to seeing everyone there!
name: CMSa2 OPEN HOUSE

description:
Literati is pleased to welcome Katie Kitamura in support of her most recent novel, A Separation, a staff favorite and a Literati Cultura selection. Katie will be joined in conversation by Natalie Bakopoulos, author of The Green Shore.

A young woman has agreed with her faithless husband: it’s time for them to separate. For the moment it’s a private matter, a secret between the two of them. As she begins her new life, she gets word that Christopher has gone missing in a remote region in the rugged south of Greece; she reluctantly agrees to go look for him, still keeping their split to herself. In her heart, she’s not even sure if she wants to find him. As her search comes to a shocking breaking point, she discovers she understands less than she thought she did about her relationship and the man she used to love. 

A searing, suspenseful story of intimacy and infidelity, A Separation lays bare the gult that divides us from the inner lives of others. With exquisitely cool precision, Katie Kitamura propels us into the experience of a woman on edge, with a fiercely mesmerizing story to tell.

“A slow burn of a novel that gathers its great force and intensity through careful observation and a refusal to accept old, shopworn narratives of love and loss.” —Jenny Offill, author of Dept. of Speculation

“A novel so seamless, that follows its path with such consequence, that even minor deviations seem loaded with meaning. Wonderful.” —Karl Ove Knausgaard, author of My Struggle

“The burnt landscape, the disappearance of a man, the brilliantly cold, precise, and yet threatening, churning tone of the narrator—make A Separation an absolutely mesmerizing work of art.” —Rachel Kushner, author of The Flamethrowers

“Profound and gripping. I had that rare sense of feeling like I was in a creation specifically made out of words, that couldn’t have been made out of any other substance. Kitamura combines the calm complexity of Joseph Conrad with the pacing and reveal of Patricia Highsmith. This novel is a wonder and a pleasure.” —Rivka Galchen, author of Atmospheric Disturbances and Little Labors

“A Separation opens up fissures of ambiguity in emotional experiences too often misunderstood as monolithic—grief, desire, estrangement—and plumbs these crevices for all their complexities. It has both urgency and afterglow: I read it quickly, but didn’t stop thinking about it for a long time once I was done.” —Leslie Jamison, author of The Empathy Exams

Katie Kitamura is a critic and novelist living in New York City. She is the author of Gone to the Forest and The Longshot, both of which were finalists for the New York Public Library’s Young Lions Fiction Award. A recipient of a Lannan Residency Fellowship, Kitamura has written for The New York Times, The Guardian, Granta, BOMB, Triple Canopy, and is a regular contributor to Frieze.

Event date: 
Monday, February 13, 2017 - 7:00pm
Event address: 
Literati Bookstore
124 E. Washington St.
Ann Arbor, MI 48104
name: Katie Kitamura, w/ Natalie Bakopoulos

description: Take your date to Sweetwaters on Washington Street and get a FREE single brewed coffee with the purchase of a slice of pie! A delicious deal for the two of you. ❤️
name: Celebrate Valentine's Day at SW

description:
Let’s celebrate Valentine’s Day All Week Long!
Saturday, February 11 – Tuesday, February 14, 2017
Dinner Available Each Day 4pm – Close

3- COURSE DINNER MENU FOR TWO

FIRST COURSE
Please select one of the following:
Soup, Bleu Cheese Cole Slaw, House Salad or Caesar Salad

SECOND COURSE
Lobster Stuffed Filet Mignon
Topped with hollandaise sauce then served with grilled asparagus and Duchess potatoes

THIRD COURSE
Dessert to share
Chocolate Molten Cake
with a warm creamy center and a scoop of vanilla ice cream

Reservations Recommended
(888) 456-3463 (DINE)
Call to reserve your spot!
$69.95 for two, tax/gratuity not included.
Limited time offer. 
http://carsonsamericanbistro.com/valentines-dinner-for-two/
___________________________________

DRINK SPECIALS 
(Not included in price of the Dinner for Two)

“Amore Martini” 
Malibu, Peach Schnapps, Citrus Vodka, Cranberry Juice $10.95

“Kir Royale”
LaMarca Prosecco, Crème de Cassis $11.95

____________________________________
name: Valentine’s Dinner for Two, 2/11 – 2/14

description: Join us every Tuesday for beer and veggies! We're hosting Sunseed Farm's fresh vegetable CSA pickup on Tuesday nights from 5-7 pm. CSA members are eligible for $2 and $3 flagship and Beer of the Month pints. Interested in joining Sunseed's CSA? Visit farmsunseed.com
name: Sunseed Farm CSA Pickup

description:
Join us at Aventura for an exclusive Valentine's Day tasting menu created especially for you and your special someone in mind. From the ambiance to our service, all the way to the very last course, let us guide you through an experience you are sure to never forget! 

$85 Ticket Includes:

Specially crafted 4-Course Tasting Menu 
Vegetarian Options Available
Cava Toast (Spanish bubbles)
Aperitivo 
Tax and 18% Gratuity
Ticket pricing is per person. 

Be sure to book your evening with us right away, you won't want to miss this!

VALENTINE'S DAY MENU
Tuesday, February 14
 
4 COURSES – $85
 
APERITIVO
______________________________________________________________________

COJONUDO 
ground spanish chorizo, sweet onion, brava sauce, fried quail egg, on grilled brioche 
 
1st course
______________________________________________________________________

SALMOREJO CORDOBES Y CAVIAR
tomato soup from andalusia with tuna, ibérian ham croutons, quail eggs, salmon caviar


2nd Course
______________________________________________________________________

TARTAR DE ATUN DE ALMADRABA
almadraba tuna loin, soya, pickles, avocado, wasabi fly fish roes

3rd Course
______________________________________________________________________
Choose One

PRESA IBERICA CON FOIE GRAS
steak from black-footed ibérian pigs with foie gras

PARRILLADA DE MARISCOS
grilled fish and seafood festival, sea bass, octopus, lobster, scallops, prawns, green sauce
 
4th Course
______________________________________________________________________

BUÑUELOS DE CHOCOLATE, CHURROS Y HELADO DE TURRÓN
chocolate beignets, churros and spanish nougat ice cream


VALENTINE'S DAY VEGETARIAN MENU
 
4 COURSES – $85

APERITIVO
______________________________________________________________________

TRUFA, PATATA Y BERENJENA | TRUFFLE, POTATO, AND EGGPLANT 
potato and truffle mash, roasted eggplant, honey, thyme, on grilled brioche 

1st Course
______________________________________________________________________

ENSALADA CITRICA DE REMOLACHA
mixed beetroot salad, citrus fruits, sour cream 

2nd Course
______________________________________________________________________

VEGETARIAN
TARTAR VEGETARIANO
tomato, roasted bell pepper, pickles, red onion, mustard, tahini, avocado

3rd Course
______________________________________________________________________

ARROZ BOMBA CON SETAS Y TRUFA
spanish rice with mushrooms, truffles, saffron, garlic, fresh chili, sofrito
 
4th Course
______________________________________________________________________

BUÑUELOS DE CHOCOLATE, CHURROS Y HELADO DE TURRÓN
chocolate beignets, churros, and spanish nougat ice cream
name: Valentine's Day at Aventura
